channel.title: CVE Feed for GE -- MDS PulseNET and MDS PulseNET Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GE -- MDS PulseNET and MDS PulseNET Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2018-10613|2024-09-16T16:52:57.226Z -- ge -- mds%20pulsenet%20and%20mds%20pulsenet%20enterprise
item.description: Multiple variants of XML External Entity (XXE) attacks may be used to exfiltrate data from the host Windows platform in GE MDS PulseNET and MDS PulseNET Enterprise version 3.2.1 and prior.
